name: Overland Storage
overview:
Overland Storage, Inc. is a global provider of data management and data protection solutions across the data lifecycle. Overland offers an range of integrated technologies and services for primary, nearline, offline, archival and cloud data storage that allow users to manage different tiers of information over time. Whether distributed data is across the hall or across the globe, Overland’s vision is to enable companies to focus on building their business instead of worrying about data growth.

Overland offers the SnapServerÂ® line of network attached storage (NAS) and storage area network (SAN) solutions designed for primary and secondary data storage; the REOÂ® series of products, which provide disk-based data protection, continuous local backup and remote disaster recovery; and the NEOÂ® series of tape backup and archive systems, which are designed to meet long-term data archiving and regulatory compliance requirements. The company also offers data management and data protection software.

Overland’s solutions are used in various industry sectors, including financial services, video surveillance, healthcare, retail, manufacturing, telecommunications, broadcasting, and research and development. Overland Storage markets its products through value-added resellers, direct market resellers, distributors, original equipment manufacturers, and sells to small and midsize businesses, enterprises, multinational corporations, governmental organizations, and educational institutions. The company was formerly known as Overland Data, Inc. and changed its name to Overland Storage, Inc. in 2002. Overland Storage was founded in 1980 and has offices in San Diego, California and San Jose, California.

milestones.description: Overland Storage Inc. Prices Underwritten Public Offering of $6,400,000 Million of Common Stock
